Learning Guide

1

Understand Slippage

Slippage is the difference between expected and actual trade prices due to market movement

2

Check Liquidity

Higher liquidity means better prices and less slippage

3

Review Fees

DEXs charge fees for trading - typically 0.3% on Uniswap

4

Confirm Transaction

Always review transaction details before signing
